headline.main: Chief of the Commandos; Chief of the Commandos

lead_paragraph: SOMEWHERE in these embattled islands is the secret headquarters where high officers of the army, navy and air force plan and direct those recurrent sorties against the enemy-held coast of Europe which have come to be known as "Commando raids" and are causing much consternation among Hitler's generals.
